attributes.review:
your heart fluttered. it was like something out of a movie. as he strode to you, you couldn’t quite make out his face. you can distinctly remember all the playful tradings and all the willful snuggles you personally experienced with him. you’re always thinking about him, he somehow can never leave your mind. your heart and mind are intertwined and set. you want to spend the rest do your life with this very man. except…what does he look like? of course nothing could change your mind and your affection but that very hesitation of whether you would give your desires to a masked man was on the edge of real contemplation. he would always whisper, “the true me would be ruined, but you can enjoy the masked me.”

wow. his magnetic mysterious aura somehow drew you closer, fascinated and enamored for more and more. two months sprinted by, ending with you, well, smitten. you are in love with this man. you are so deeply in love and there’s no way to pop up your head above the water to take a quick fresh breath of air. just plummeting you softly yet forcibly sexy down down down. 

he was going to reveal himself to you tonight. the sky was drooped with a shattering ebony. tonight is the night everything would now change. forever. he would not be safe once everyone knew he had fallen. fallen rock hard for YOU. his wife would be understanding. he had kidnapped her only for attractive offspring, he had once felt a love for her, unfortunately she foolishly never reciprocated his profess. 

his calloused fat fingers smoothed out the wrinkled worry lines embedded on your forehead. his breath smelled like expired hot cheetos. SEXY expired hot cheetos.

 “are you ready baby girl?” his voice curdled.

“i leaned my neck back. 

“Show me everything.”

he delicately removed his mask. your eyes lightened, expecting a handsome young beau with fantasies and love for you beyond compare.

a pudgy orange stump stared back. his eyes were laced with greed and triumph. he wore a stained blue suit, complementing his shaggy balding flaxen hair horribly. his grip felt like moldy peanut butter as he grasped your hands.

coincidentally, your hands started to shake. hard.
HE was your love? the man you were willing so hard to run away with, willing so hard to create a life with? It was Donald Trump? 

the president.

his mouth quirked with a smile. “come here,”
he growled.

you’ve never run harder then that.
